edge: The movie features Sidharth Malhotra in the lead role as Abhay Bunty Singh.
In the movie, Parineeti Chopra plays the character of Babli Yadav in a few scenes as Mona Ghosh Shetty.
Javed Jaffrey appears in the movie as Hukum Singh.
Sanjay Mishra plays the role of Duniya Lal Yadav in the movie.
The character Santosh Pathak is played by Aparshakti Khurana in the movie.
Elli Avram features as Zilla in the movie.
Ruslaan Mumtaz plays the role of Kush in the movie.
In the movie, Chandan Roy Sanyal essays the character of Guddu.
The movie has Neeraj Sood portraying Pathak ji.
Arfi Lamba is seen as Jeetu in the movie.
In the movie, Yogita Rathore features as Abhay's sister.
The movie has Sheeba Chadda enacting the role of Abhay's mother.
In the movie, Mohit Baghel replaces Mohit Daga as Halla.
The movie features Gopal Datt as Inspector Tiwari.
In the movie, Aaryan Arora plays the younger version of Sidharth Malhotra's character Abhay.
The movie has Anupam Mishra essaying the role of a Photographer.
In the movie, Sharad Kapoor is seen as Daddan Yadav.
